channel.title: MadCap Flare on Heather Cloward
channel.description: Recent content in MadCap Flare on Heather Cloward

item.title: Using Git with MadCap Flare
item.description: When I first started at my current job, the documentation team was using Subversion as the source control for their MadCap Flare projects. To access Subversion they used a graphical user interface(GUI) called TortoiseSVN. The MadCap Flare project was very large and so checking out the project to make updates took about half an hour. Furthermore, while one person on the team was making updates, the other people on the team could not.
